EmailTemplate.name: 201809_Americas_Email_DU875Upgrade_DR.201809_Americas_Email_DU875Upgrade_1_DR
EmailTemplate.subject: DU-875 Display Upgrade with Honeywell and Western Aircraft
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://www.westair.com/]]>
Improve your pilot's vision and add instant value to your aircraft with the DU-875 upgrade for Falcon 900EX/900C and Embraer Legacy 600/650 from Honeywell and Western Aircraft.
Replace one or all DU-870 displays that are in the end of their life-cycles with the DU-875 and receive the benefits that come with this easy and cost-effective upgrade:
- Reduced HAPP Warranty Program Cost - Greatly increased time between failures - Reduced weight - Greatly reduced cockpit temperatures - 12-month warranty - Honeywell and Airframe OEM growth plan for integration of future technologies and applications, keeping your aircraft´s avionics suite running at full potential.
Avoid obsolescence!
Contact Western Aircraft today for more information on updating the DU-875 for your aircraft or fleet.
UPDATE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/WesternAircraft_DU-875.html]]>
